thread.section_title: Homeadvisor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homeadvisor | www.homeadvisor.com | 5 of 385
thread.title: Cecelia Walter

author: Cecelia Walter
title: Cecelia Walter
text: I always check Homeadvisor when looking for a professional for a project at my home. Sometimes I hire based on outside recommendations, but more often, I find professionals through Homeadvisor. Homeadvisor provides information on companies listed along with reviews from Homeadvisor users. I feel safe hiring recommended professionals to come to my house. I particularly like that Homeadvisor makes the initial contact for me without showing my contact information; I can choose whether or not to provide it later. I would definitely recommend Homeadvisors.
